subject: Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: Spanish cycling officials have chosen to be lenient on Alberto Contador, proposing a one-year ban instead of the usual two-year sanction for a first-time doping offense.
snippet: Spanish cycling officials have chosen to be lenient on Alberto Contador, proposing a one-year ban instead of the usual two-year sanction for a first-time doping offense.
